item.title: CV
item.description: .column-left{ float: left; width: 33%; } .column-center{ display: inline-block; width: 33%; } .column-right{ float: right; width: 33%; } Contact phone: 904-662-9453 email: contact@taraskaduk.com location: Jacksonville, FL Summary Love R Love data science Love online learning, self-education, love spreading knowledge, love helping people learn stuff Hate redundancy, bad processes, manual tasks that should have been automated. Living a minimalism-driven and adventurous life, preferring flexibility and ability to move to new places or work remotely Mad R Skills tidyverse forecast caret rmarkdown Other rad skills SQL Power BI Data Visualization All things data Languages: Russian - native Ukrainian - native English - fluent French - elementary to intermediate Main Work Experience Manager, Business Intelligence & CRM Suddath | April 2017 - Present | Jacksonville, FL
